description:
Pipeline Multibranch projects come as a natural evolution of pipeline as code: define your CD pipeline in your source code repository and Jenkins will create isolated branch and pull requests jobs for it. This talk is about the integration of the Pipeline Multibranch plugin with Github and Bitbucket as branch sources.

Delivered by Antonio Muniz
title: Jenkins World 2016 - Lightning Talk #2: CD Pipelines as Code with Github and Bitbucket​
